text: Xuqujeꞌ man kaya ta ri kꞌakꞌ vino pa qꞌeꞌl taq kꞌolibꞌal, rumal cher ri kꞌakꞌ vino kutꞌoqopij riꞌ ri qꞌeꞌl taq kꞌolibꞌal, xaq jeriꞌ katix ri kꞌakꞌ vino, xuqujeꞌ katꞌoqopin ri kꞌolibꞌal. Rumal riꞌ are utz na we kaya ri kꞌakꞌ vino pa ri kꞌakꞌ taq kꞌolibꞌal,9:17 Ri vino kaya pa ri alaj taq kꞌolibꞌal bꞌantal che utzꞌuꞌmal awaj. Ri vino we kaya pa kꞌakꞌ kꞌolibꞌal kanimar ri vino, are kꞌu we kaya pa ri qꞌeꞌl kꞌolibꞌal man kanimar taj. jeriꞌ man katꞌoqopin ta ri kꞌolibꞌal xuqujeꞌ man katix ta ri vino.
